appDescription.message: Universal browser extension for Web 3 and the Polkadot ecosystem

errorMnemonicUnmatched.message: Mnemonic not matched with generated one

pickColorDescription.message: This can be changed in the settings

speckleIntroduction.message: Speckle is a Web 3 wallet and browser built for Polkadot. You can interact with multiple chains and manage their accounts.
